Human Rights
As a responsible corporate citizen, AGNC seeks to promote and protect human rights in our business. As reflected 
in the AGNC Statement on Human Rights , we strive to conduct our operations in accordance with the United 
Nations Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights, and we recognize the importance of respecting, 
protecting and promoting human rights and fundamental freedoms such as those encompased by the United 
Nations Universal Declaration on Human Rights.
